name: sfchronicle
text:
A fire that raged through Klamath National Forest was a blow for the Karuk Tribe because it destroyed homes in an area native leaders had planned to thin out using traditional burning. The U.S. Forest Service never got around to the collaboration.

https://t.co/LSl9cMxhDy

text: RT @SportingGreenSF: In the 49ers‚Äô horrific 43-17 loss to the Dolphins, Raheem Mostert ran 11 times for 90 yards (8.2 per) and caught three passes for 29 yards. He accounted for 119 of the 49ers‚Äô 259 offensive yards, writes @eric_branch  https://t.co/Dv6JTzRkFd

name: sfchronicle
text:
Firefighters-for-hire flooded into the Glass Fire as it threatened expensive homes and multimillion-dollar wineries. 

This has been happening for years, but officials say the number of private crews is rising, and with it the potential for conflict. https://t.co/aRDhbhrL1G
